text: Zeko Burgess is a Bermudian cricketer. In August 2019, he was named in Bermuda's squad for the Regional Finals of the 2018–19 ICC T20 World Cup Americas Qualifier tournament. In November 2019, he was named in Bermuda's squad for the Cricket World Cup Challenge League B tournament in Oman. He made his List A debut, for Bermuda against Uganda, on 6 December 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Bermudian cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Zeko Burgess
